name: Santa's Gift: Physic Puzzle
description:
Santa’s Gift is amazing physic puzzle game, help our Santa collect the gift box by touch the ice bar to move the other items. Try to collect as many stars as possible. This game simple to play but very hard to pass all levels. Santa’s Gift Physic Puzzle Game is Xmas game for all people to play.

Simple play, touch the ice bar to move the items and make the gift box touch Santa.
